attributes.action: Stop members of parliament having such a huge salary
attributes.additional_details:
I want the goverment to understand what life is like and take the minimum wage not the massive salaries and expenses paid to them by the Tax payer 
See the struggles every day real people have 
Why should we pay to have them driven around 
Why should we pay for thier accomadation 
Why should the Tax payer pay for them to dine out 
All these expenses come from the UK tax payer 
MINIMUM WAGE FOR ALL IF SO PASSIONATE ABOUT THE JOB THEY ARE DOING
attributes.background:
Should members of parliament have such huge salaries 
I believe if they are passionate about thier country as they claim to be they would do it for the passion  for thier country regardless of thier history or qualifications

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
